desc: Our aromatherapy collection includes vegan soy-wax candles, diffuser oils and mineral bath salts all scented with pure essential oils in our signature blends. We also stock a range of ethically made accessories including weighted eye pillows, decorative matches and candle gift sets in eco-friendly packaging.

layout.text: Hand-blended natural fragrances, created to celebrate incredible women
ESSENTIAL OIL BLENDS ~ SCENTED SOY WAX CANDLES ~ MINERAL-RICH BATH SALTS ~ ETHICAL & SUSTAINABLE GIFTS
